channel.title: Need help changing client IP in 718 Client
channel.description: Hey, I can't seem to find the IP.. I've looked in client.java and Searched for "127.0.0.1" and also "no-ip" and no search results are coming up. Any suggestions? Thanks

item.title: Need help changing client IP in 718 Client
item.dc:creator: @amirparvis amirparvis
item.description:
@amirparvis wrote:

Just go to your client and search 127.0.0.1 or no-ip or 0.0.0.0

hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing client IP in 718 Client
